Fabiana Tokie Yagihara

  • Endereço para acessar este CV: http://lattes.cnpq.br/4251045716550906
  • Última atualização do currículo em 20/06/2013

Undergraduate degree in Physical Therapy at Universidade Santo Amaro, SP, Brazil. Master degree in Sciences at the Division of Biology and Sleep Medicine, Department of Psychobiology, Federal University of Sao Paulo. PhD student from the pulmonology program at the University of Sao Paulo (Texto informado pelo autor)
